title: Go out like this in fall, Airwheel Good Quality Self Balance Electric Scooter Is Your Best Choice
text: Press Releases Go out like this in fall, Airwheel Good Quality Self Balance Electric Scooter Is Your Best Choice Fall is coming and teachers are coming back to campus. Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter, intelligent, cool, green and low-carbon, brings you the coolest experience on campus. USA, 14 September 2015 -- Say goodbye to August and hug September. Everyone easily feels that a new school year is only one step away. Airwheel intelligent electric scooter provides every college teacher with a new way of locomotion. Riding Airwheel, the fashionable and high technology are always with you. Enjoy the intelligent and convenient teaching life.A lot of college teachers take public transportation to school, but the distance with the bus or subway station and the campus is always annoying. However, Airwheel intelligent scooter changes this situation. It can be taken to bus and subway, unlike bike or electric-bike. It has cool and high-class look, diverse functions, which is the best transport for college teachers. A good product is always customer-oriented. Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter is outfitted with the most intelligent chip around the global. The chip has the most intelligent system in the world, using aerospace attitude control theory, fuzzy software algorithm, and gyroscope system to realize self-balance. Rider only needs to move forwards or backwards slightly to control it, to speed up or slow down. College teachers can ride Airwheel electric intelligent scooter to classroom, which is safe, portable, and environmentally friendly. Besides, Airwheel intelligent scooter is not a transport, but also a good way for teachers to work out. Nowadays, teachers live in a busy world under huge pressure. They are busying with lesson preparations, researches and paper writing every day. Therefore, it is commonly seen that college teacher sit in the office or the lab for a whole day. Though Airwheel is powered by electricity, riding it for 30 minutes costs 285 calories and riding for 30 minutes costs 900 calories. At the same time, it can improve people’s balancing ability and nerve reflex flexibility, which trains our shoulders, ridge, arms and legs, and builds up our body as well. When riding Airwheel intelligent scooter, college teachers don’t need to worry about being late to class in the early morning or walking a long distance to bus station and campus. Let’s choose Airwheel intelligent scooter! # # #
